title: Where can I find this font?
content:
Does anyone know where I can get this font. I’ve seen it embedded in Embroidery programs but can’t find it in TTF/OPEN/PS formats.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120002146im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG001_2_5649.gif)

 [‹ Script and bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120002146/http:/typophile.com/node/50297 "Go to previous forum topic") [What is the name of this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120002146/http:/typophile.com/node/50290 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Proto Media
